MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH48 postcode area of Torphichen and the surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to repair faulty equipment at Wallhouse Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.18am on Thursday 17th December 2020.
